issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
custom alloy mobile template app is generated under a sub-folder when this template it used. When the app is run, it basically runs the single tab alloy app.

Not sure if I am doing anything wrong. I can see the logo and the template within the selection of Alloy templates.

Using Studio 4.7
fields.summary: unable to create mobile apps from custom templates

comments.body: Hello, Your query is not clear, Can you please explain a little more? Perhaps with a sample code and steps to follow and descrive the output behavior. Thanks.
